00044 struct Vector3D;

00046 struct NormalVector
00047 {
00048     NormalVector( double dx = 0.0, double dy = 0.0, double dz = 0.0 );

00052     NormalVector& operator-=( const NormalVector& nRhs );

00054     NormalVector& operator/=( double a );

00056     double operator[]( int i ) const;

00059     double Length( ) const;
00060 
00061     double x;
00062     double y;
00063     double z;
00064 };
